genres.name: Rock
genres.description: Rock music is a broad genre of popular music that originated as rock and roll in the United States in the late 1940s and early 1950s.

genres.name: Pop
genres.description: Pop music is a genre of popular music that originated in its modern form during the mid‑1950s.

genres.name: Jazz
genres.description: Jazz is a music genre that originated in the African‑American communities of New Orleans in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.

genres.name: Blues
genres.description: Blues is a music genre and musical form which originated in the Deep South of the United States around the 1860s.

genres.name: Electronic
genres.description: Electronic music is music that employs electronic musical instruments, digital instruments, or circuitry‑based music technology.

artists.name: The Beatles
artists.description: The Beatles were an English rock band formed in Liverpool in 1960. Regarded as the most influential band of all time.

artists.name: The Rolling Stones
artists.description: The Rolling Stones are an English rock band formed in London in 1962. Active for six decades.

artists.name: Pink Floyd
artists.description: Pink Floyd are an English rock band formed in London in 1965. Distinguished for their extended compositions and sonic experimentation.

artists.name: Queen
artists.description: Queen are a British rock band formed in London in 1970. Classic line‑up was Freddie Mercury, Brian May, Roger Taylor and John Deacon.

artists.name: Led Zeppelin
artists.description: Led Zeppelin were an English rock band formed in London in 1968.

artists.name: Nirvana
artists.description: Nirvana was an American rock band formed in Aberdeen, Washington, in 1987.

artists.name: Radiohead
artists.description: Radiohead are an English rock band formed in Abingdon, Oxfordshire, in 1985.

artists.name: Daft Punk
artists.description: Daft Punk were a French electronic music duo formed in 1993 in Paris.

artists.name: Miles Davis
artists.description: Miles Dewey Davis III was an American trumpeter, bandleader, and composer.

artists.name: Taylor Swift
artists.description: Taylor Alison Swift is an American singer‑songwriter.

albums.title: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
The Dark Side of the Moon
